CPF allocation table by ageAs you go above 35 years old  the allocation to both SA & MA increases to prepare for retirement. While OA allocation decreases as you become financially secure and depend less on CPF for housing  investment and education funds.This is an important table to refer to  especially when you are doing the "Supercharge" CPF strategy.Discuss more athttps://t.me/honeymoneysg
